Name: Skylost
About the game: On a rescue mission, brave the mysteries of Spire, a series of beautiful, floating islands to which none yet have dared to travel. Armed only with your wits, limited supplies, and the items you discover during your journey, traverse the exhilarating verticality of this sky world. Craft, climb and glide your way past the Spireâ€™s dangerous beasts and find your missing love, Amelia and save her from her fate! Uncover Secrets: What has become of Amelia? What is the origin of the mysterious glowing red light? Discover the secrets behind these mysteries of the spire. Exploration Emphasized: Explore this strange and wonderful world, to discover new materials, dangerous beasts, and exciting inventions! Crafting Creativity: Craft new and exciting items to help you on your journey and overcome the obstacles you face however you want to; from a Noisemaker to distract or a stealth field to hide. Exciting Traversal: Throw your grappling hook to climb to dizzying heights and soar high over the world with the glider. Traverse the floating islands of Spire in whatever way you see fit.
